__e: Je suis ici et en profitant de la vie les vieux sont morts et l'homme qui a commandé le crime, s'a lavé ses mains... Et regardez ! Malchance !
Here we are, alive and kicking the old fools buried and the man who ordered the murder, like Pilate washing his hands.

Eun-byeol and her sister suffered as much as you did, but they don't blame others. They live their lives.
